fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.power

Interface PowerDevice

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GenericDevice
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PowerSwitchmeter

    public interface PowerDevice
extends GenericDevice
    Common interface for Power device service descriptions
    Author:
    gunalp

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String POWER_DEVICE_ATTACHED_DEVICE_NAME
      Service property indicating the attached devices name This property is mandatory Type of values : java.lang.String Description : value is a String indicating the attached devices name
      static String POWER_DEVICE_ATTACHED_DEVICE_WATT
      Service property indicating the attached devices default Power Rating expressed in watt (W) This property is mandatory Type of values : java.lang.Double Description : value is a power rating expressed in watt (W), so it is always positive.

      • Fields inherited from interface fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.GenericDevice

        DEFAULT_HEIGHT, DEFAULT_WIDTH, DEVICE_SERIAL_NUMBER, FAULT_NO, FAULT_PROPERTY_NAME, FAULT_UNKNOWN, FAULT_YES, LOCATION_PROPERTY_NAME, LOCATION_UNKNOWN, STATE_ACTIVATED, STATE_DEACTIVATED, STATE_PROPERTY_NAME, STATE_UNKNOWN

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.GenericDevice

        addListener, enterInZones, getFault, getProperties, getPropertyValue, getSerialNumber, getState, leavingZones, removeListener, setFault, setPropertyValue, setState
